section.title: db_url (string)
section.para: The URL of the database to be used.
Default value is "mysql://ser:heslo@localhost/ser".

section.title: user_attrs_table (string)
section.para: Name of the table with user attributes.
Default value is "user_attrs".

section.title: uri_attrs_table (string)
section.para: Name of the table with uri attributes.
Default value is "uri_attrs".

section.title: uid_column (string)
section.para: Name of the column that stores UID in the user attributes table.
Default value is "uid".

section.title: username_column (string)
section.para: Name of the column containing the username of the subscriber in uri attributes table.
Default value is "username".

section.title: did_column (string)
section.para: Name of the column in uri attributes table containing the ID of domain that the subscriber belongs to.
Default value is "did".

section.title: name (string)
section.para: The name of the column containing attribute names.
Default value is "name".

section.title: value_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column containing attribute values.
Default value is "value".

section.title: type_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column containing attribute value type.
Default value is "type".

section.title: flags_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column containing attribute flags.
Default value is "flags".

section.title: scheme_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column containing subscriber's scheme in uri attributes.
Default value is "scheme".

section.title: attr_group (string)
section.para: 'Extra attribute' group definition. It can be repeated to define more attribute groups.

The group definition contains one or more assignments in the form key=value. Possible keys are:
id
Attribute group identifier. Must be set.
table
Table name used for storing attributes from this attribute group. Must be set.
flag
Attribute flag name used to mark attributes in this group. Must be set.
key_column
Column name holding key. Default value is id.
name_column
Column name used for storing attribute name. Default value is name.
value_column
Column name used for storing attribute value. Default value is value.
type_column
Column name used for storing attribute type. Default value is type.
flags_column
Column name used for storing attribute flags. Default value is flags.
None defined by default.

section.title: auto_unlock_extra_attrs (string)
section.para:
Determines the action when any of the 'extra attributes' lock is detected when routing script execution was finished.
When the value of this parameter is zero (default) BUG level message is logged, but the lock is kept, so another process trying to obtain the lock might get stuck.
If the value is nonzero, DEBUG level message is sent to the log and all the locks are released.
Default value is 0.
